events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred yesterday evening involving my vehicle and another driver at the intersection. The damage is severe, and I need assistance with the claim.
The claim has been reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved a collision and damages to the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claims process and provide support throughout.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged, and we appreciate your prompt notification regarding the auto accident.
Please submit all relevant documents including photographs of the damage, police report, and your vehicle registration for further processing.
All requested documents, including police reports and images of the damaged car, have been submitted successfully by the claimant.
An investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has commenced to assess damage and liability.
The investigation has been completed, confirming fault and the extent of the damage to the insured vehicle.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation results and repair cost estimates presented.
We have received feedback from the customer regarding the proposed settlement and are considering their response.
The claim has been approved, and we are moving forward with the payment to cover the repair costs of your vehicle.
Payment has been issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the approved damages resulting from the auto accident claim.
The claim case has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment issuance relating to the vehicle collision.
All records and documentation of the auto accident claim have been archived in the system for future reference if needed.
